HeroSection.label: NAS
HeroSection.title: QNAP & Synology **NAS Support**
HeroSection.subtitle: Connect your NAS device to Internxt Drive for secure file storage and backups.

WhatIsNASSection.title: What is a NAS device, and why should I use it?
description: A NAS (Network Attached Storage) is a dedicated storage system that connects to your home or office network, acting as a personal server for your files. Using it with Internxt lets you back up, sync, and manage data securely while keeping full control and ownership of your files.

Your data is encrypted and secure with Internxt’s post-quantum encryption, and the keys are managed on your device. This offers the convenience of NAS devices with the security and privacy of Internxt Drive.

InternxtNASIntegrations.title: Internxt NAS integrations
InternxtNASIntegrations.description: Install the Docker app to connect your NAS to Synology or QNAP. This setup lets you securely access, manage, and sync your files while keeping full control over your data.

synologyBox.title: Synology
synologyBox.description: Synology is a popular NAS system that allows you to store, organize, and access your files from multiple devices. You can run apps, manage your backups, and share data securely.

QNAPBox.title: QNAP
QNAPBox.description: By connecting Internxt via Docker, you can securely manage, sync, and access your files directly on your QNAP NAS.

ctaSection.title: Internxt Drive for NAS
ctaSection.description: Keep your files safe, accessible, and private

horizontalScrollableSection.title: Backup your NAS in the cloud
horizontalScrollableSection.description: Manage, sync, and back up your data in the cloud with Internxt’s NAS support. Thanks to Internxt’s post-quantum encryption, your privacy is always guaranteed.

descriptions: Never worry about losing your files. Internxt syncs your NAS automatically, so every document, photo, and project is safely backed up in the cloud. This protects against hardware failures or accidental deletion.

Keep your files up-to-date across all devices. Any changes you make on your NAS or in Internxt Drive are automatically reflected everywhere, ensuring your team or personal devices always have the latest version.

Your data is protected with post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption, so all keys are managed and stored on your device for maximum privacy. Only you can access your files, and no hackers, third parties, or even Internxt can read your data.

Network Attached Storage, or NAS, lets you manage storage, set permissions, and create backups on your own terms, giving you flexibility and ownership over your information with the convenience and privacy of Internxt Drive.

whatInternxtOffersSection.title: What Internxt offers with NAS devices
whatInternxtOffersSection.description: Connect Internxt Drive to your NAS system for a secure cloud solution to backup and sync your files in total privacy.

descriptions: Enjoy all the benefits of Internxt with the flexibility and control of QNAP and Synology devices for effortless cloud storage management.
Get secure remote access to your files from anywhere, while giving you full control over your data.
Protect your files against ransomware with encrypted backups that let you quickly restore files affected by ransomware or accidental data loss.

howSetupSection.title: How to set up your NAS device with Internxt
howSetupSection.description: Instructions on how to set up and configure your NAS device with Internxt Drive:

descriptions: Get the information you need about NAS capabilities with Internxt and usage instructions for different platforms from our GitHub page.
Learn how to set up your Network Attached Storage device with Internxt with examples and explanations.
Verify the security of Internxt and stay updated for new updates and features.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain. Internxt has numerous European cloud data centers to store your data in line with GDPR and other compliance regulations.

faq.question: Where are Internxt’s cloud data centers located?
answer: Internxt makes use of a multi-cloud network strategy, ensuring files are stored across multiple European cloud data centers to ensure you get the best performance, security, and protection for your files.

faq.question: How do Internxt’s data centers work?
answer: Internxt partners with OVHcloud, who own European cloud data centers and multiple locations across the globe to store your cloud data.
These data center infrastructures host thousands of servers to guarantee availability, performance, and redundancy to ensure quick and secure access to files while keeping your files secure.

faq.question: What is an availability zone?
answer: Availability zones are a set of one or more data centers located in a region. Each availability zone works independently and has its own power, cooling, and network to prevent power outages or other events such as infrastructure failure.
Zones within a region are linked to provide higher availability and low-latency connections, ensuring applications can stay online even if one zone experiences a failure.

faq.question: Can Internxt access my files?
answer: No, nobody, including Internxt, can access your files. All your files and data are encrypted on your device with post-quantum encryption. As the keys are stored and managed on your device and not by us or our service providers, only you or people you choose to share files with can decrypt them.
All files stored in our data centres are encrypted, so no employees or hackers can view their contents.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: Can't find what you're looking for? You can contact our technical support team through live chat or by emailing hello@internxt.com
